description: Detects creation/modification of Assistive Technology applications and persistence with usage of 'at'
false_positives: Creation of non-default, legitimate at usage
name: Atbroker Registry Change
query: (winlog.event_data.TargetObject:(*Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Accessibility\\ATs* OR *Software\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Accessibility\\Configuration*) AND (NOT (process.executable.text:"C\:\\Windows\\system32\\atbroker.exe" AND winlog.event_data.TargetObject:*\\Microsoft\\Windows\ NT\\CurrentVersion\\Accessibility\\Configuration* AND winlog.event_data.Details:"\(Empty\)")))
author: Mateusz Wydra
oscd.community
